channel.title: In Sickness and in Health on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in In Sickness and in Health on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: EP 16: The Buckley Fizz - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast by James and Clair Buckley. We’ve got another festive episode for you today, starting with a spot of present opening (which you can watch on our social channels!) We’ve had some great listener write-ins - one which proves the success of James’ famous Kit-Kat chat up line - and after responding to your Christmas marital mayhem, the Buckleys advise on how to get rid of drunk relatives this Christmas!

item.title: EP 16 - The Buckley Fizz - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

item.title: I Don’t Mean To Brag! | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to a very special BONUS episode of In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast by James and Clair Buckley. We’ve got an extra Christmas helping of Buckleys today, brought to you by Volkswagen ID Buzz! We hear about the family’s recent trip to the seaside, resulting in James being heckled and fifty quid being spent on two Cola-bottle sweets?! The pair debate the Loch Ness Monster and James’ use of America lingo, whilst finally rounding off our bonus episode with a bit of karaoke.

item.title: EP 15: Tits the Season! - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast by James and Clair Buckley. We’ve got a festive episode for you today! The Buckley’s conjure up some Christmas chat up lines; they discuss their ghost of Christmas past; and James shares his VERY reasonable fear of Santa. We hear another ruthless listener train story and attempt to solve your festive marital mayhem - keep sending them in, the juicier the better!

item.title: EP 15: Tits the Season! - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

item.title: EP 14: Absolute Beefer - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to another episode of In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast by James and Clair Buckley. In today’s ep, The Buckley’s discuss all things film and TV, plus we get to hear about the 85th greatest horror movie of all time - The Pyramid starring James himself! Clair’s got a great story this week about meeting Tom Cruise, and the pair get to the bottom of this week’s listener dilemma about a sneaky bitcoin buyer.

item.title: EP 14: Absolute Beefer - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

item.title: EP 13 - A Pickled Egg & A Bottle of Stella - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast by James and Clair Buckley. Today the Buckley’s are bearing all - James discusses his recent testicle infection whilst Clair deliberates vaginal rejuvenations. This week’s marital mayhem is horrifying, but right up Clair’s street. And we FINALLY get James to try a pickled egg, so check out our socials to see his animated response! Tune in every Tuesday for more In Sickness and in Health, and subscribe and follow us on social media to watch the best bits from the latest episodes - @insicknessandinhealthpodcast

item.title: EP 12 - Turkey Teeth - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast by James and Clair Buckley. In today’s episode, the Buckley’s share all the nitty gritty details of Clair’s pregnancy and birthing experiences! James reveals that he’s recently been trolled for having “Turkey teeth” which leads into a VERY interesting discussion about who looks younger? James also lets slip that he’s considering doing his Cameos whilst on the toilet… BEWARE!

item.title: EP 12 - Turkey Teeth - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

item.title: EP 11: Nice And Slippery - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley. In this week’s episode, Clair reveals whether or not she fancied James as Jay from the Inbetweeners and then let’s slip which of their celebrity mates nearly caused a fire on their wedding day! The Buckley’s share their opinions on various ‘controversial’ foods - pickled eggs, venison,Turkey dinosaurs, etc, whilst finally getting to the bottom of the great ketchup debate - in the fridge or in the cupboard?

item.title: EP 11: Nice And Slippery - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

item.title: EP 10: The Mysterious Knickers - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to another episode of In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley. In today’s ep, the Buckley’s reveal that they were heading for divorce this week over a mysterious pair of silky, sexy knickers! James discusses partying with Baby Spice, then the pair share stories of their first dates and Clair reveals which chat-up lines would win her over! Tune in every Tuesday for more In Sickness and in Health, and subscribe and follow us on social media to watch the best bits from the latest episodes - @insicknessandinhealthpodcast

item.title: EP 9: Ghouls & Mystic Megs - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to a SPOOKY episode of In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley. After James updates us on his latest annoyances, the Buckleys chat about all things related to Halloween! They cover Ouija boards, creepy rocking horses, mystic megs, and Harrison Buckley’s ghostly friend ‘Papa Joke’. And here’s something for you to think about: could James’ scariest costume of all be sticking on a blonde wig and an England shirt and knocking on your door as Jay from the Inbetweeners?

item.title: EP 8: Kick 'Em To The Kerb Baby - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to another episode of In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley. Once again, the Buckley’s are back with another disastrous train journey story, and boy, do they have a lot to get off their chests today! They then go on to discuss the phenomenon of ‘Love Languages’ and take the quiz themselves! James gets flustered by today’s marital mayhem and spills all on what he classes as his ‘vanilla’ bedroom antics!

item.title: E 7: Big Brain, Small Penis - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to another episode of In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley. In today’s ep, James and Clair chat about all things related to tattoos and piercings. The Buckley’s talk us through their experiences getting inked and James learns all about the infamous Prince Albert piercing! Following a poo related ‘Marital Mayhem’, James and Clair bare all and share THEIR shocking stories of getting caught short!

item.title: EP 6: After-Party With A Priest ft. Miles Kane - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to another episode of In Sickness and in Health, the smash hit podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley.  We’ve got an exciting episode for you today, as we are joined by the LEGENDARY Miles Kane! The Buckleys grill Miles on his non-negotiables - from farting to music-taste to pulling out wedgies, the trio discuss all the nitty gritty details of relationships! And finally, we’re all now waiting to find out whether we’ll be seeing James on stage with Miles on his upcoming tour?

item.title: EP 5: Ditch That Zero, Get Yourself A Hero - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to this week's episode of In Sickness and in Health, the new smash hit podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley. Today the Buckley’s discuss holidays and their recent disastrous trip to Disneyland! They reveal the unusual chat up line that first wooed Clair, James chats about his close run-in with sharks, and we’ve got a WILD marital mayhem for you this week - it’s all about mummy’s boys, crotchless pants and peephole bras!

item.title: EP 5: Ditch That Zero, Get Yourself A Hero - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

item.title: EP 4: The Boy Who Cried Piles - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to another episode of In Sickness and in Health, the new smash hit podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley. In this week’s episode, James (or as he’s known by his GP, Jason) chats about his unusually large tonsils and his frequent trips to the doctor for a root around. James and Clair then discuss expiry dates and whether the ‘sniff test’ does the trick. We’ve also got our first listener dilemma by voice note, and boy, do the Buckleys have some opinions on this one!

item.title: EP 3: Sex Scandal - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to episode 3 of In Sickness and in Health, the new smash hit podcast by James and Clair Buckley. Today we have our first podcast guests (and possibly the most IMPORTANT ones at that), Harrison and Jude Buckley! But before the boys spill all the dirt on what it’s like being a Buckley, James and Clair share their thoughts on their latest non-negotiable - adults on E-Scooters - and chat about that time James nearly found himself in a sex scandal!

item.title: EP 3: Sex Scandal - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

item.title: EP 2: Toenails Everywhere - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to episode 2 of In Sickness and In Health, the brand new podcast hosted by James and Clair Buckley. This week, we get to find out whether the Buckley’s have kept up their vows of change?! James reveals a few of his dirty habits, Clair confesses to laughing in James’ face during their wedding vows, and we find out that Clair’s alter ego is… JOE PESCI!! And one more thing, did you know that James was in a play?

item.title: EP 2: Toenails Everywhere - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

And one more thing, did you know that James was in a play?

item.title: EP 1: From This Day Forth - (Part 2) | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to the very first episode of In Sickness and in Health, the brand new podcast hosted by James & Clair Buckley. In this podcast, with listener and guest participation, we’ll delve into marriages and relationships, exploring non-negotiables and what you would or wouldn’t put up with “In Sickness and In Health.”In today’s episode, James and Clair finally reveal how they first met and relive the shock of finding out they were pregnant whilst filming the Inbetweeners movie!

item.title: EP 1: From This Day Forth - (Part 1) | In Sickness and in Health

In this podcast, with listener and guest participation, we’ll delve into marriages and relationships, exploring non-negotiables and what you would or wouldn’t put up with “In Sickness and In Health.”In today’s episode, James and Clair finally reveal how they first met and relive the shock of finding out they were pregnant whilst filming the Inbetweeners movie!

item.title: Introducing... In Sickness and in Health | In Sickness and in Health
item.description: Podcast Description James and Clair Buckley are here, after popular demand, to discuss the nitty gritty details of marriage, relationship non-negotiables, and fundamentally, what you wouldn’t put up with “In Sickness and in Health”. Each week the hilarious duo share their latest antics and life irritations, whilst getting to the bottom of your marital mayhems! We’ll be welcoming guests and listener participation throughout the show, and will finally get to the bottom of the question on everybody’s lips - what’s it really like being married to Jay from The Inbetweeners?
